--------------------
Text: The Cathedral Church of Saint German or Peel Cathedral, rebranded as Cathedral Isle of Man is located in Peel, Isle of Man.
Triplets:<The Cathedral Church of Saint German
1:
--------------------
Text: Peel Cathedral:  The cathedral is also one of the parish churches in the parish of the West Coast which includes the town of Peel, and was built in 1879–84.
Triplets:<Peel Cathedral
2:
--------------------
Text: Peel Cathedral:  It was made the cathedral by Act of Tynwald in 1980.
Triplets:<Peel Cathedral
